item.title: 澳大利亚 8 月通胀率降至 3 年低点，核心通胀率仍高于目标值
item.description: 得益于政府的电费退税和汽油价格的下降，澳大利亚 8 月份的消费者价格通胀率放缓至三年来的最低水平，而核心通胀率则创下了自 2022 年初以来的最低水平，这表明成本正在降温。【原文：Australian consumer price inflation slowed to a three-year low in August thanks to government rebates on electricity and a drop in petrol, while core inflation hit its lowest level since early 2022 in a sign costs were cooling.】

item.title: 韩国财政部长将需求复苏置于家庭债务之上
item.description: 韩国财政部长周三表示，短期内政府政策的优先重点是应对国内需求的放缓，而不是家庭债务的增加。【原文：South Korea's finance minister said on Wednesday that the government's policy priority was more focused on tackling slowing domestic demand than rising household debt in the short term.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 CPI 通胀率降至 2.7% 的三年低点
item.description: 受政府电费退税和汽油价格下跌的影响，澳大利亚消费者价格通胀率在 8 月份放缓至三年来的最低水平，而核心通胀率则创下了自 2022 年初以来的最低水平，这表明成本正在逐步降温。【原文：Australian consumer price inflation slowed to a three-year low in August due to government rebates on electricity and a drop in petrol, while core inflation hit its lowest since early 2022 in a sign costs were cooling albeit gradually.】

item.title: 中国央行下调中期贷款利率
item.description: 中国央行周三下调了对银行的中期贷款成本，此举与前一天宣布的广泛政策宽松措施一致，以支撑疲软的经济。【原文：China's central bank lowered the cost of its medium-term loans to banks on Wednesday in a move consistent with broad policy easing measures announced a day earlier to shore up a flailing economy.】

item.title: 中国刺激政策希望减弱，美国原油库存下降，油价持稳
item.description: 尽管一份行业报告显示美国原油和燃料库存下降支撑了市场，但由于全球最大的原油进口国中国对经济刺激政策的热情减退，油价在前一交易日上涨后于周三回稳。【原文：Oil prices steadied on Wednesday after rising in the previous session on fading excitement for the economic stimulus in China, the world's biggest crude importer, though an industry report showing falling U.S. crude and fuel inventories supported the market.】

item.title: 澳元、新西兰元受中国提振再创新高
item.description: 周三，澳元和新西兰元攀升至数月高位，英镑兑弱势美元则创下两年多来的最高点，因为中国积极的刺激计划为风险偏好注入了最新一针强心剂。【原文：The Australian and New Zealand dollars scaled multi-month peaks on Wednesday while sterling hit its highest in more than two years against a weaker dollar, as China's aggressive stimulus package provided the latest shot in the arm for risk appetite.】

item.title: 碧桂园服务以 4.46 亿美元出售珠海万达股权
item.description: 中国房地产开发商碧桂园旗下的碧桂园服务周三表示，同意以 31.4 亿元人民币（4.4654 亿美元）的价格出售其持有的珠海万达商业管理有限公司 1.49% 的股份。【原文：Country Garden Services , the property services arm of Chinese property developer Country Garden , said on Wednesday it agreed to sell its 1.49% stake in Zhuhai Wanda Commercial Management for 3.14 billion yuan ($446.54 million).】

item.title: 纽约联储主席 Perli：市场已准备好正确看待上周的降息
item.description: 纽约联邦储备委员会负责执行货币政策的央行官员周二表示，金融市场已准备好将降息幅度超出预期的情况正确理解为并非是麻烦的征兆。【原文：The central bank official responsible for implementing monetary policy at the New York Federal Reserve said on Tuesday financial markets were prepared to properly interpret a bigger-than-expected interest rate cut as something other than a sign of trouble.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 Fortescue 公司与利勃海尔签署价值 28 亿美元的绿色设备合作协议
item.description: Fortescue 周三表示，该公司已与德国-瑞士设备制造商利勃海尔签署了一项价值 28 亿美元的合作协议，以打造世界上最大的零排放采矿车队之一。【原文：Fortescue said on Wednesday it has signed a $2.8 billion partnership with German-Swiss equipment manufacturer Liebherr to create one of the world's largest zero-emission mining fleets.】

item.title: 星巴克首席执行官尼科尔表示致力于与工会进行 "建设性接触
item.description: 星巴克新任首席执行官布莱恩-尼科尔（Brian Niccol）周二在一封信中表示，他 "非常尊重 "咖啡连锁店工人选择由工会代表的权利，并承诺 "建设性地参与"。【原文：Starbucks' new CEO Brian Niccol said in a letter on Tuesday that he "deeply respects" the right of the coffee chain's workers to choose to be represented by a union, and that he was committed to "engage constructively."】

item.title: 美国电子游戏演员呼吁热门游戏《英雄联盟》制造商罢工
item.description: 电子游戏演员工会称，该工会周二对为热门网络游戏《英雄联盟》提供配音服务的福茂互动公司提出了不公平劳动行为指控并宣布罢工。【原文：Union video game actors filed an unfair labor practice charge and declared a strike on Tuesday against the company Formosa Interactive, which provides voiceover services for the popular online game “League of Legends,” the actors’ union said.】

item.title: 罢工进入第三周，马拉松公司与卡车司机协会的谈判仍处于停滞状态
item.description: 马拉松石油公司和代表密歇根州底特律炼油厂工人的卡车司机工会陷入僵局，新劳资协议谈判停滞不前，工厂罢工进入第三周。【原文：Marathon Petroleum and the Teamsters union, which represents refinery workers in Detroit, Michigan, are at a standstill as negotiations for a new labor agreement stagnate and the strike at the plant enters its third week.】

item.title: 早间竞标中国发射了 "更大的炮弹，但仍然没有火箭筒
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 如果波音公司参与任何犯罪活动，FAA 将通知司法部
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局（Federal Aviation Administration）局长将于周三在美国参议院小组会议上表示，该局将继续与司法部合作，对波音公司进行监督。【原文：The head of the Federal Aviation Administration will tell a U.S. Senate panel on Wednesday that the agency will remain engaged with the Justice Department on oversight of Boeing.】

item.title: Meta 不会在新法律出台前立即加入欧盟人工智能公约
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司发言人周二表示，该公司不会立即加入欧盟的《人工智能协议》。【原文：Meta Platforms will not immediately join the European Union's AI Pact, a company spokesperson said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 法官裁定纽约市关于共享送餐员数据的法律违宪
item.description: 一名联邦法官周二宣布，纽约市一项要求送餐公司与餐馆共享客户数据的法律违宪，称该要求侵犯了送餐公司的第一修正案权利。【原文：A federal judge on Tuesday declared unconstitutional a New York City law requiring food delivery companies to share customer data with restaurants, saying the requirement violates the companies' First Amendment rights.】

item.title: 拜登政府官员称，拜登政府对美国港口谈判采取放手态度
item.description: 一位不愿透露姓名的政府官员周二表示，乔-拜登总统的政府官员并未试图促成一项劳资协议，以避免美国东海岸和墨西哥湾沿岸港口在 10 月 1 日举行罢工，这些港口处理着美国大约一半的海运进口货物。【原文：Officials from President Joe Biden's administration are not trying to broker a labor deal to avert an Oct. 1 strike at U.S. East and Gulf Coast ports that handle roughly half of the country's ocean imports, an unnamed administration official said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 关税、减税是特朗普向选民推介经济的核心内容
item.description: 共和党总统候选人唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将关税和减税作为他向选民推销经济的主要内容，大多数选民认为经济是 2024 年总统大选的最大竞选议题。【原文：Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump has made tariffs and tax cuts the key elements of his economic pitch to voters, the majority of whom view the economy as the biggest campaign issue of the 2024 presidential election.】

item.title: 波音公司为罢工工会工人提供更多时间就新报价进行投票
item.description: 波音公司周二表示，已向代表美国西海岸数千名罢工工人的工会提供了更多的时间和支持，以便就其新的劳资协议进行投票，而周五早些时候提出的最后期限遭到了拒绝。【原文：Boeing said on Tuesday it has offered additional time and support to the union representing thousands of its striking workers in the U.S. West Coast to vote on its new labor offer, after an earlier Friday deadline was rejected.】

item.title: 车队工会与博格华纳达成为期四年的新合同协议
item.description: 代表博格华纳公司 700 多名工人的卡车司机工会（Teamsters Union）周二表示，它已与这家汽车零部件制造商就一份为期四年的新合同达成协议。【原文：The Teamsters Union, which represents more than 700 workers at BorgWarner , said on Tuesday it has reached an agreement for a new four-year contract with the auto parts maker.】

item.title: 华尔街监管机构因加密货币问题在众议院面临两党怒火
item.description: 美国众议院两大党的立法者周二再次就华尔街首席监管机构对加密货币的政策对其进行了攻击，指责美国证券交易委员会阻碍了该行业的发展。【原文：Lawmakers from both major parties in the House of Representatives on Tuesday renewed their attacks on Wall Street's chief regulator over his agency's policies on cryptocurrencies, accusing the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission of hampering the industry's growth.】

item.title: 美国上周原油和产品库存可能下降 - 路透社调查
item.description: 路透社周二进行的一项调查显示，预计上周美国原油和产品库存将有所下降。【原文：U.S. crude oil and product stockpiles were expected to have fallen last week, an extended Reuters poll showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国指责 Visa 垄断借记卡刷卡业务
item.description: 美国司法部周二起诉 Visa 涉嫌违反反垄断法，指控这家全球最大的支付网络之一以高额费用威胁商户并收买潜在竞争对手，从而压制竞争。【原文：The U.S. Department of Justice sued Visa for alleged antitrust violations on Tuesday, accusing one of the world's largest payment networks of suppressing competition by threatening merchants with high fees and paying off potential rivals.】

item.title: 微软将在墨西哥斥资 13 亿美元开发云计算和人工智能技术
item.description: 科技巨头微软公司周二宣布，将在未来三年内投资 13 亿美元，在墨西哥建设云计算和人工智能基础设施。【原文：Tech giant Microsoft will invest $1.3 billion over the next three years to build up its infrastructure in Mexico for cloud computing and artificial intelligence, the company announced on Tuesday.】

item.title: 埃利奥特将召集西南航空股东召开特别会议，以实现领导层更迭
item.description: 激进投资者埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）周二升级了与美国西南航空公司（Southwest Airlines）的董事会争斗，称其计划最快于下周召开特别股东大会，以彻底改革该航空公司的领导层。【原文：Activist investor Elliott Investment Management on Tuesday escalated its boardroom battle with Southwest Airlines , saying it plans to call a special shareholder meeting as soon as next week to overhaul the airline's leadership.】

item.title: 欧佩克发布 2050 年全球石油展望，认为需求不会达到顶峰
item.description: 欧佩克在一份年度展望报告中上调了对世界中长期石油需求的预测，理由是印度、非洲和中东地区的石油需求增长，以及向电动汽车和更清洁燃料的转变速度放缓。【原文：OPEC raised its forecasts for world oil demand for the medium and long term in an annual outlook, citing growth led by India, Africa and the Middle East and a slower shift to electric vehicles and cleaner fuels.】

item.title: 泰坦尼克号》导演詹姆斯-卡梅隆加入 Stability AI 董事会
item.description: Stability AI 公司周二表示，《泰坦尼克号》和《终结者》的导演詹姆斯-卡梅隆已加入这家人工智能初创公司的董事会。【原文：Stability AI said on Tuesday James Cameron, the director of "Titanic" and "The Terminator" movies, had joined the artificial intelligence startup's board.】

item.title: 美国证交会指控 Foot Locker 前高级主管内幕交易
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会周二指控一名前 Foot Locker 高管涉嫌内幕交易，称他在 2023 年两次公布财报前卖空了该零售商的股票。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission charged a former Foot Locker executive on Tuesday with insider trading, saying he sold short the retailer's stock prior to two earnings announcements in 2023.】

item.title: 美国法官支持挑战堕胎法规的天主教雇主
item.description: 一名美国法官阻止了联邦机构执行乔-拜登总统政府制定的一项规定，该规定要求雇主为堕胎或接受某些生育治疗的员工提供便利，该规定针对的是一个全国性天主教商业协会的成员。【原文：A U.S. judge has blocked a federal agency from enforcing a rule crafted by President Joe Biden's administration requiring employers to accommodate employees who have abortions or undergo certain fertility treatments against members of a nationwide Catholic business association.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克和 X 公司寻求驳回唐-莱蒙因取消合作而提起的诉讼
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）和 X 公司要求联邦法官驳回 CNN 前主播唐-莱蒙（Don Lemon）的诉讼，唐-莱蒙声称他们在一次有争议的采访后取消了在社交媒体平台上的合作，从而欺骗了他。【原文：Elon Musk and X asked a federal judge to dismiss former CNN anchor Don Lemon's lawsuit claiming they defrauded him by canceling a partnership on the social media platform following a contentious interview.】
